name: Indian Institute of Technology Indore (IIT Indore)
description: IIT Indore is a premier engineering institute established in 2009. It offers various undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs. The campus spans over 500 acres with state-of-the-art facilities.

name: Shri Govindram Seksaria Institute of Technology and Science (SGSITS)
description: SGSITS is one of the oldest and most prestigious engineering institutes in Indore, offering a range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

name: Institute of Engineering and Technology (IET) DAVV
description: IET DAVV is a constituent institute of Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, offering quality engineering education with modern infrastructure.

name: Acropolis Institute of Technology and Research (AITR)
description: AITR is a private engineering college known for its emphasis on research and innovation, offering various technical and management programs.

name: Indore Institute of Science and Technology (IIST)
description: IIST offers a blend of engineering and management courses with a focus on practical learning and industry exposure.

name: IPS Academy, Institute of Engineering and Science
description: IPS Academy is a multidisciplinary institute offering a range of programs in engineering, management, and other fields.

name: Prestige Institute of Engineering Management and Research (PIEMR)
description: PIEMR is known for its quality engineering education and strong industry connections, facilitating excellent placement opportunities.

name: Medi-Caps University
description: Medi-Caps University offers a wide range of programs in engineering, management, and sciences, with a focus on research and innovation.

name: SAGE University
description: SAGE University is a multidisciplinary institution offering a variety of programs with modern infrastructure and facilities.

name: Oriental University
description: Oriental University offers diverse programs in engineering, management, and other fields, focusing on holistic development.
